item.description: @MisfitTorah Not sure what his position would be on yelling Shabbos at a street theatre….

item.description: @Shmarya Won’t someone think of the Torah that won’t be learned for Nine Days siyummim in the post-meat world?

item.description:
@MisfitTorah I bet the legislator in question doesn’t consider herself controversial.

@MisfitTorah Also, non-legislators should also be conscious of OpSec in such matters.
